replies.msg:
利物浦後衛華基爾雲迪積克大讚新加盟的門將艾利臣比加，指對方經常提點後防，令球隊的防守變得更為穩固。

今季以6,500萬鎊由羅馬轉投利物浦的艾利臣在周日的英超的地標戰保持清白之身，協助紅軍主場大勝韋斯咸4:0。雖然艾利臣今仗未有受到太大考驗，不過球隊後衛雲迪積克對這位新隊友的印象就相當良好。

雲迪積克透露，自己與艾利臣無論場內場外都經常溝通：「我們經常談話，他是一位很敢發聲的球員，所以比賽期間經常會提醒我和其他後衛走到適當的位置防守。雖然我們仍需要時間磨合，但我認為他的水準很高，加盟短短時間已經為我們帶來改變。」

利物浦兩位中堅路夫雲和卡拉雲在周日的賽事都無法上陣，領隊高路普起用了年輕後衛祖高美斯與雲迪積克一起鎮守中路，雲迪積克同樣稱讚祖高美斯表現出色：「老實說，和他拍檔我並不擔心，我和祖高美斯在季前熱身賽已經合作過，他擁有很好的球賽閱讀能力，我知道當球隊需要他時他一定能夠挺身而出。」

“If anything happens to a player, there’s adequate cover.

“During pre-season I played alongside a variety of different players and we blended really well. So, overall, I think it’s a good thing for the team.”

In order to sneak into pot two, the Reds need Portuguese side Benfica to get eliminated. Today, Benfica made it through the third qualifying round by eliminating Fenerbahce, despite the best efforts of Agent Skrtel, who started for the Turkish side. That means Benfica have one final hurdle to jump over in order to secure their place in the group stage and in pot two. And in an interesting twist, the team they’ll have to get through are Liverpool’s first saviors, Greek side PAOK.

The two-legged tie takes place on August 21st in Lisbon, and then the return leg will be in Greece on August 29th.

Klopp recently described Ramos as “ruthless and brutal,” and the Spanish defender has lashed back at the Liverpool manager by suggesting he is not a top-level coach.

“Some of us have been operating at a very high level for many years, I’m not sure he can say the same,” he said.

Klopp has failed to win six of his seven finals during his coaching career, a stark contrast to Ramos’ four Champions Leagues, four La Ligas, two European Championships with Spain and the 2010 World Cup triumph.

Middlesbrough look to have missed out on Everton’s Muhamed Besic, and now according to reports in The Evening Standard, Liverpool midfielder Marko Grujic has rejected a loan move to Teesside.

Grujic spent the latter half of last season in the Championship with Cardiff City, and helped them to achieve automatic promotion up to the Premier League. Now back at Liverpool, it seems likely the Serbian international is set to leave the club on another short term deal.

However, the midfielder has rejected a loan move to Middlesbrough, and has also rejected a return to Cardiff City in the top flight.

A loan move abroad looks the most likely destination for Grujic with Russian outfit CSKA Moscow interested in signing the 22-year old, if playing time can be promised. Liverpool are hoping he can return to Anfield with valuable playing time under his belt, so that he can kick on and even make an impression in the first team.
